Articles.Content: Not sure about the rest of you, but come Christmas I'm using a nice bit of vacation and will have several days to goof off and relax. It would be just grand to see if Santa could pack KSP .23 into the stocking for Xmas for me to enjoy on that vacation. I've been good... mostly....
I think because Squad announced .23 going into experimental phase it will be the players gift. I just hope it is released before the 25th so I can enjoy it on my break from school!

If it was released then, I wouldn't be able to play for a few weeks, as I will be leading on the state's most awesome. Youth camp. Not that it would matter, I'd get home to find my favorite mods updated, hopefully.

Christmas?

I think Squad will release .23 before/during Kerbalkon.

Just speculation tho, don't quote me on this.

Still, a bonus Christmas present would be nice. Something in the vein of Eeloo perhaps?

Christmas?

I think Squad will release .23 before/during Kerbalkon.

Just speculation tho, don't quote me on this.

Still, a bonus Christmas present would be nice. Something in the vein of Eeloo perhaps?

Oooooh, too late. I just quoted you.
It looks to be a Green Christmas after all! Version .23 announced to be released the 17th!

Going away most of Christmas I hope I don't miss the update like last time...

I've also been good, and I've only killed 300 or so Kerbals (IT WAS FOR SCIENCE OK)

Going away most of Christmas I hope I don't miss the update like last time...

I've also been good, and I've only killed 300 or so Kerbals (IT WAS FOR SCIENCE OK)

Looks like somebody's gonna get a lot of Mun rocks in their stockings on the 25th....
So today I start my vacation and I've just set up my HDMI extender to my 70in HDMI TV. Now with .23 in hand and a house to myself... IT'S A CHRISTMAS MIRACLE! Merry Christmas... everyone!
